titles.title: Expressing thanks to the people of the city of Rome for welcoming several million people into Rome and Vatican City during the funeral observances of Pope John Paul II in April 2005.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary: 7/12/2005--Introduced. Thanks the residents of Rome, Italy, local businessmen, officials of Vatican City, and officials of the government of Rome and the Italian government for welcoming several million people into Rome and Vatican City during the funeral observances of Pope John Paul II in April 2005.
